00026 typedef struct _subscriber{

00030 } t_subscriber;

00035 typedef struct _preset_item{
00036         t_symbol                *param_name;
00037         t_symbol                *type;
00038         long                    priority;

00040         long                    list_size;
00041 } t_preset_item;
00042 
00043 typedef jcomList<t_preset_item*> presetItemList;
00044 typedef list<t_preset_item*>::iterator presetItemListIterator;

00047 typedef struct _preset{

00053 } t_preset;
00054 
00055 typedef jcomList<t_preset*> presetList;
00056 typedef list<t_preset*>::iterator presetListIterator;
